siteMetadata.title: Paul Waweru
siteMetadata.subtitle: Software Engineer. Passion for travel and food. North London is Red. Navigating through this thing called life.

markdownRemark.html:
Oh, and welcome to my new and revamped blog! For months I’ve been wanting to up my game and improve the look (and content of course) of my blog, and I’ve finally got around doing so. Anyway, back to the story…

First of all, let’s begin with some context. Me and my co-founder and very good friend Charlie Dowler are aiming to shake the fitness industry through an imersive and easy-to-use app for finding like-minded people to exercise with (ahh, elevator pitch over, how did we do?). We’ve been building the startup since August of this year, and it’s been an interesting and challening few months. Along with this and upcoming posts, I envision documenting our journey and experience as we navigate through building what we believe is a valualbe and life-chaging product, mistkaes we made along the way and the success we achieve.

Where are you now?

You may ask,

frontmatter.title: Startup Life
frontmatter.description: I'm building a startup. Yes, you read correctly. That thing where literally everyone says is far too high risk and you should stick to your stable corporate job? Yes, that's what I'm doing. Wish me luck! Read more if you're interested in my journey...
